channel.title: Sweaters on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sweaters on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Sweating the Ugly Truth
item.description: [whitebox] Hey all, Ernie here with another issue of Tedium by Andrew Egan. Last time he showed up on Tedium, he broke down NYC’s now-repealed dancing ban, and before that, he told us about professional cornhole. Now, he’s talking sweaters. [big]Today in Tedium: Some simple inventions took a surprising amount of time to create. Case in point: The can opener was invented 45 years after the can. Reasons for these delays tended to result from technological gaps rather than a lack of Ingenuity.
